page.title: 05Mobile Shops in Lawshall.
page.content: Apart from static shops there is a mobile baker/grocer calling 3 times a week. A highclass grocer, twice a week 2 mobile butchers both visiting twice weekly and a fried fish & chip van every Wednesday evening-this is very popular.Also a Dairy roundsman deliver- ing fresh milk, dairy products and some groceries 4 times a week. There is an egg shop at a local farm, although the hens are kept a little distance away, the eggs & occasional chickens are sold at the farm shop.A daily newspaper and magazine delivery operated by one of the residents of Lawshall, serving about a 7 mile radius of this village. There is a weekly visit from the County Library van and a 3 monthly visit from the Local Health Authority's mobile chiropody unit.
